title: Community Lead
details: Created an ecosystem of 1400+ developers where we provide resources, roadmaps, opportunities updates. Connecting hustlers and professionals with like-minded developers.

title: Project Admin
details: Helped folks to begin with Open-source. Created an environment of working in a team among the young hustlers. Successfully merged 80+ PRs after providing proper guidance to the Open Source Enthusiast.

title: Technical Writer
details: Wrote articles related to web designing and how to become a pro in frontend development.
